notificationConfiguration.bodyText:
BackGround job @{asyncJob.displayName} Failed to execute. Maximum(@{asyncJob.numberOfTries}) number of attempts exceeded.
Entity : @{asyncJob.entityName}
@{asyncJob.errorMessage}
notificationConfiguration.notificationName: BackGround Job exceeded maximum number of attempts
notificationConfiguration.subject: BackGround job @{asyncJob.displayName} Failed.

notificationConfiguration.bodyText:
Task @{task.taskSummary} is created and assigned to you as potential owner
Task # : @{task.refNumber}
Name : @{task.taskName}
Subject : @{task.taskSummary}
Description : @{task.taskDescription}
Owner : @{task.owner}
Status : @{task.wfStatus}
Priority : @{task.taskPriority}
Due Date : @{task.dueDate}
notificationConfiguration.subject: Task @{task.taskSummary} is created

notificationConfiguration.bodyText:
Task @{task.taskSummary} has met its deadline and not completed yet
Task # : @{task.refNumber}
Name : @{task.taskName}
Subject : @{task.taskSummary}
Description : @{task.taskDescription}
Owner : @{task.owner}
Status : @{task.wfStatus}
Priority : @{task.taskPriority}
Due Date : @{task.dueDate}
notificationConfiguration.subject: Task @{task.taskSummary} has met its deadline

notificationConfiguration.bodyText:
Task @{task.taskSummary} is Completed

Name : @{task.taskName}
Subject : @{task.taskSummary}
Description : @{task.taskDescription}
Owner : @{task.owner}
Status : @{task.wfStatus}
Priority : @{task.taskPriority}
Due Date : @{task.dueDate}
notificationConfiguration.subject: Task @{task.taskName} is Complete

notificationConfiguration.bodyText:
@{task.taskName} is reassigned to @{task.reassignOwner} user on the task

Task Details:
  • Task Name - @{task.taskName}
  • Task ID - @{task.refNumber}
  • Due Date - @{task.dueDate}
  • Previously assigned to - @{task.owner}
  • Re-assigned to - @{task.reassignOwner}
  • Comments - @{task.reassignReasonCommentDerived}
  • Date of re-assignment - @{task.assignedDate}
  • @{task.getLoggedInUser()} re-assigned the task
Work Item Details:
  • @{task.getWorkItemObj().getClass().getSimpleName()} @{task.getEntityRefNumber()}
notificationConfiguration.subject: @{task.taskName} is reassigned to @{task.reassignOwner} user on the task

notificationConfiguration.bodyText:
User has released @{task.taskName}
Task Details:
  • Task Name - @{task.taskName}
  • Task ID - @{task.refNumber}
  • Due Date - @{task.dueDate}
  • Task Status - @{task.wfStatus}
@{task.getWorkItemObj().getClass().getSimpleName()} details:
  • @{task.getWorkItemObj().getClass().getSimpleName()} Name - @{task.getWorkItemDisplayValue()}
  • @{task.getWorkItemObj().getClass().getSimpleName()} Number - @{task.getEntityRefNumber()}
notificationConfiguration.subject: User has released @{task.taskName}

notificationConfiguration.bodyText:
A new Application is created on Grade
APPLICATION LINK: @{_config.getString('webapp.server.baseurl')}/crud/request/edit.seam?canvasType=crud&eid=@{entity.id}
Application ID: @{entity.refNumber}
Application NAME: @{entity.requestName}
Application DATE: @{entity.receivedDate}
notificationConfiguration.subject: NEW GRADE APP: #@{entity.refNumber} - @{entity.requestName}
